hooks.pre-commit: npm run build:markdown && git add terms.md

scripts.build:markdown: commonform render -f markdown --title 'Software License Terms' terms.cform > terms.md
scripts.build:html: commonform render -f html5 --title 'Software License Terms' --ordered-lists terms.cform > terms.html
scripts.build:docx: commonform render -f docx --title 'Software License Terms' --number outline --left-align-title --indent-margins --styles styles.json terms.cform > terms.docx
